11166.quoteText: You are only allowed to use the Services when aged 16 or older.

11167.quoteText: Cookie or web beacon information: cookie IDs and settings and other personal information received through cookies, web beacons or pixel tags.
11167.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

11168.quoteText: Marketing information: some partners may provide additional (aggregated) information, for instance through their Software Developer Kits (SDKs). This may contain demographic or behavioural information in order for us to personalize content, advertisements and offers and to find the right audience for our advertisements
11168.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: This service gathers information about you through third parties

11169.quoteText: we use your personal information for marketing and (interest based) advertising
11169.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

11170.quoteText: Business partners: we collaborate with advertising partners, marketing and communication agencies. We do this for (interest based) advertising, branding and reaching out to you. Our advertising partners implement their own tracking cookies which fall under their terms of services and privacy &. cookie statement. Please find a list of all third party cookies and their privacy policies here.
11170.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

11171.quoteText:
We’re a global business, which means we might share or store personal information in countries outside of the European Economic Area (“EEA”).
Those countries have different data protection laws in place.
However, when we transfer- and host data globally, we will make sure that appropriate safeguards are in place in order to ensure your personal information enjoys a similar level of protection as it would within the EEA.
11171.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

11172.quoteText:
Advertisement cookies are often also placed by third parties to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and to follow your internet- and surf behaviour over other domains and websites where they have placed a cookie.
WeTransfer does not have access to or control over personal information collected via these cookies or other features that advertisers and third parties may use.
11172.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

11173.quoteText:
Note that WeTransfer may revise this Privacy &amp.
Cookie Statement from time to time.
Each revised version shall be dated and posted on the website.
11173.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

11174.quoteText: WeTransfer recommends that you review the website from time to time and take note of any changes. If you do not agree with the Privacy &. Cookie Statement, you should not or no longer access or use the website and/or service. By continuing to use the website and/or service you accept any changes made to the Privacy &. Cookie Statement.
11174.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

11719.quoteText: In order to connect with our target audience, we might use sequential messaging, which is basically a form of storytelling: each time you interact with our Services on a different device, you may receive a slightly different ad in a different form, but the ads are part of the same story
11719.title: Your profile is combined across various products

tosdr.case: Your profile is combined across various products

11720.quoteText:
WeTransfer only checks the (one) website you visited prior to your visit to one of our websites.
We do not track the website you visit after you leave our website.
11720.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

tosdr.case: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

12051.quoteText: Any modification to or deletion of a provision or part-provision under this clause shall not affect the validity and enforceability of the rest of these Terms.
12051.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

12052.quoteText:
You can ask WeTransfer to:

  1. access, receive a copy of or correct your personal information;
  2. in certain cases, erase your personal information or block or restrict our use of it

12059.quoteText: WeTransfer reserves the right to investigate, provide to third parties, (temporarily) block and/or permanently delete from it servers, without prior notice or liability, any Content and/or accounts or to block anyone from accessing any part of the Services, when WeTransfer ascertains, at its sole discretion or after receiving substantiated and valid complaints, that you breach these Terms or act in violation of any applicable law or regulation.
